alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 9:37PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Whiteside, southeastern Jo Daviess, eastern Carroll and southwestern Stephenson Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 937 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coleta, or near Sterling, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Coleta around 940 PM CDT. Milledgeville around 950 PM CDT. Chadwick around 955 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lanark and Shannon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
